1.0.0/ Unreleased
==================

### Changes

* [SDK] adds postgres integration to integrations-core.

* [Improvement] Makes db size collection optional. See [dd-agent-3035](https://github.com/datadog/dd-agent/issues/3035) (Thanks [@jstotzs][])
